subject: Add from_phone and to_phone to parsed output
description: The spec's input contract includes source_metadata.from_phone and to_phone, and the clean note format in redesign-call-record-association uses "From: {from_phone} | To: {to_phone}", but parse-elevenlabs-data.js doesn't extract these fields. Add them to the parsed output.
activeForm: Adding phone fields to parsed output
